amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-377 to require a GAO report on the Equal Employment Opportunity Commissions (E EOC) ability to meet the demands of its workload; its plans for investigating mixed motive age discrimination claims; and options for improving EEOCs ability to respond to allegations of age discrimination.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-377 to require a GAO report on the Equal Employment Opportunity Commissions (E EOC) ability to meet the demands of its workload; its plans for investigating mixed motive age discrimination claims; and options for improving EEOCs ability to respond to allegations of age discrimination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
